description: two brown houses on stilts; woman working on a loom and spinning wheel inside house of left; figure carrying a basket on their head, accompanied by a black and white cow, in LLQ, with three large plants; kayak in LLC; palm trees in background
markings: LRC in pencil: Limited Print No, 46/300 | on back: (pink Mikumo Woodblock  Print Co., Ltd., label)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LRC in pencil I. N. Kunio / 1961
title: Farming house
